summary: SHORTLY AFTER THE ODOMETER REACHED 500 MILES, THE ENGINE BEGAN IDLING ROUGHLY AND MISSING.  CONCERN ABOUT ENGINE FAILURE CAUSING ACCIDENT.  RETURNED TO 2 SEPARATE DEALERS.  BOTH STATED THE COMPUTER SHOWED NO PROBLEM, BUT SERVICE REPS ADMITTED HAVING OTHER COMPLAINTS.  BOTH NOTED CHRYSLER REFUSED TO ACKNOWLEDGE ANY PROBLEM.
